original_title: Two school students killed in accident close to Badulla grounds; six others injured
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – Two school students have died in a motor accident in close proximity to the Badulla Cricket Ground.
Six others have also sustained injuries, according to the Sri Lanka Police.
Police added that the accident occured when a vehicle, which was part of a parade held in line with the annual cricket match between two schools in Badulla, toppled over.
